CustomField.formula: IF( ( DATEVALUE(Start__c) >= DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),3,14) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),3,14) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) && DATEVALUE(Start__c) < DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),11, 7) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),11, 7) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) && ( $User.UTC_Offset__c = -6 || $User.UTC_Offset__c = -5 ) ) || ( DATEVALUE(Start__c) >= ( DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),4, 7) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),4, 7) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) )-7 && DATEVALUE(Start__c) < ( DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),11, 7) - MOD(DATE(Year(DATEVALUE(Start__c)),11, 7) - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7) )-7 && $User.UTC_Offset__c = 0 ) , $User.UTC_Offset__c + $User.UTC_DSL__c , $User.UTC_Offset__c )
CustomField.label: TZO User
